name: Dawn of Aydeia (Demo)
description:
Dawn of Aydeia is a 2D sidescrolling platformer where you pick from 3 different classes (Knight, Mage, Archer) to travel the world and restore your kingdoms goddess to power.

This is an early WIP project with only the first level completed so far. It will probably have some bugs and it needs to be polished! But we're always open to feedback on how to improve the game. We're just a 2-man indie team so we're working hard to build this game.

Controls(Keyboard - Default):

  • ESC - Pause Menu
  • Q/W/E/R - Class Skills
  • F - Interact

Controller support is included, you can change macros on the launch screen.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ParallelPancake

Please feel free to post here/contact us on Twitter/e-mail us with any bugs/feedback/comments/anything.
